dset1_x.title: Input Dataset X
dset1_x.description: Data set for X observations. Must specify 1 and only 1 sub-brick.

dset2_y.title: Input Dataset Y
dset2_y.description: Data set for Y observations. Must specify 1 and only 1 sub-brick.

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: Estimated population delta and Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney statistics written to file.

workmem.title: Workspace Memory
workmem.description: Number of megabytes of RAM to use for statistical workspace.
